pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Velvet Sands Resort Home About Us Services Contacts Privacy Policy Velvet Sands Resort is committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal data when you visit our website and use our services. Information Collection We may collect and process the following information about you: Personal identification information such as your name, address, email address, and phone number. Information about your reservations and stays at our resort. Financial information such as credit card details necessary for payment processing. Information you provide by filling out forms or participating in surveys. Technical information such as your IP address, browser type, and visit duration. Use of Information Velvet Sands Resort uses your information for the following purposes: To provide you with our services and process your reservations. To improve our website and services based on your feedback and usage data. To communicate with you about your reservations and respond to your inquiries. To send you information about special offers, promotions, and new services if you have given your consent. To ensure the safety of our guests and protect our property. Information Protection We follow strict security procedures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, disclosure, or destruction. Our data storage systems are secured with advanced technologies and security protocols. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data, and to restrict or object to its processing. To exercise these rights, please contact us at velvetsandsresort@gmail.com. Cookies Our website uses cookies to enhance user experience and ensure site functionality. Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our site. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect the functionality of the site. Third-Party Services We may collaborate with third parties to provide certain services necessary for our website and resort operations. These third parties may have access to your personal data only to perform tasks on our behalf, and they are obligated to keep this information confidential. Changes to Privacy Policy Velvet Sands Resort reserves the right to make changes to this privacy policy at any time. All changes will take effect upon their posting on our website. Please check this page regularly for updates. Contact If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy or the handling of your personal data, please contact us at velvetsandsresort@gmail.com. Velvet Sands Resort is dedicated to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal data is processed securely and responsibly. We value your trust and will do everything possible to safeguard your data.
